GSP33brsgor3u:2115: madhyasthamakṣaramanṛtamubhayataḥ satyena saṃpuṭitatvātsattyaprāyameva bhavatīti nāmākṣaropāsanā satyavidyāṅgatvenoktā /
GSP33brsgor3u:2117: so 'sāvādityamaṇḍale 'kṣiṇi ca puruṣastasyāharityahamiti ca nāmadvayajñānātpāpakṣayaḥ phalamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2122: tathātra phalaśrutibhedādvidyābheda iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-dve iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2128: evaṃ vidyābhede 'pyetadupāsyaikyajñānaṃ syādatra tūbhayathāsaṃbhave vidyaikyanānātvasaṃśaye satyamityupāsyarūpaikyajñānādvidyaikyaniścaya ityakṣarārthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2131: kiñca yatra pradhānavidhāvevaṅkāma iti phalaṃ śrutaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2133: iha tu prathamaja satyaṃ brahmeti vedeti pradhānavidyāvidhisthatvaṃ lokajayaphalasyābhyupetyāsmābhirnāmarūpāṅgasya phalaśruteḥ stutitvamuktam
GSP33brsgor3u:2135: pradhāne tadaṅge vā yatkiñcitphalaṃ śrutaṃ tasya sarvasyāpi śrutatvāviśeṣājjāteṣṭiphalanyāyena
GSP33brsgor3u:2142: puruṣa udgītha ityevaṃ vidvānudgātā karmaphalasamṛddhisamartha iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2149: saguṇanirguṇavidyayoḥ śrutāḥ satyakāmādayo vaśitvādayaśca guṇā mitha upasaṃhartavyā
GSP33brsgor3u:2150: na vetyupasaṃhārasya phalabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ saṃdehe satyavidyāyā ekatvādguṇasāṃkarye
GSP33brsgor3u:2155: bhinnāvidyāsthānāmapi guṇānāmāyatanādisāmyena nirguṇasthale buddhisthānāṃ stutyarthamupasaṃhāro yuktaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2158: yadyapi saguṇasthasatyakāmādiṣu nirguṇasthaguṇā antarbhūtā eva tathāpi nopasaṃhāroktervaiyarthyaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:2168: nanu yadbhaktamiti yacchabdena bhojanākṣiptaṃ bhaktamanūdya yaddhomīyamiti homasaṃyogavidhinādākṣepakabhojanalope tadākṣiptabhaktāśritahomalopa iti siddhāntī śaṅkate-tadyaditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:2169: nirguṇasyopāstilope 'pi stutyarthaguṇasthairyavadbhojanalope 'pi prāṇāgnihotrasyādareṇa stutinirvāhārthamalopa iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣasūtreṇa pariharati-evaṃ prāpta iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2175: ato bhaktavidherapavādārthatvādbhojanalope bhaktākhyaguṇasyāṅgasya lope 'pi na mukhyasyāgnihotrasya lopaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2178: ādhāne santi pavamāneṣṭyastatrāgnaye pavamānāya puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapediti
GSP33brsgor3u:2180: vihitāgnihotra havaṇyatideśena prāpta ādhānakāle cāgnihotrābhāvāttasyā guṇabhūtāyā
GSP33brsgor3u:2181: lope 'pi mukhyasya nirvāpasya na lopa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2190: āśritya vihitāhutīnāmāśrayalope lopa eva na dravyāntarākṣepakatvaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2191: yathā kratuprayuktātpraṇayanāśritasya godohanasya kratulope lope na tvāśrayāntaraprayojakatvaṃ tatheti phalitamāha-tā itiyaduktamagnihotraśabdāddravyāntaraprāptiriti,
GSP33brsgor3u:2197: mukhyāgnihotrāṅgāni saṃpādyante cetkathaṃ tadanaṅgaṃ vediratra saṃpādyate tatrāha-vediśrutiśceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2202: nanu svāmibhojanasyottarakālatvaṃ śrutyādivihitaṃ kathaṃ pūrvo 'tidhibhyo 'śnīyāditivacane bādhyate tatrāha-na hyastīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2211: yathānārābhyādhītaparṇamayītvaṃ juhūdvārā kratvaṅgatayā karmasu nityaṃ prayujyate,
GSP33brsgor3u:2214: prayujyate yathā vā paśvaṅgayūpāśrayaṃ bailvatvamannādyaphalatvādanityaṃ tathā karmasamṛdyādiphalakatvādupāsanānyanaṅgatvenānityānīti saṃśayārthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2220: tathā cāṅgatayā prayogavidhinā nityena prayujyanta iti prāpte siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-yānītyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:2221: udgīthādayaḥ karmaṇāṃ guṇāḥ aṅgāni teṣāṃ yāthātmayaṃ rasatamatvādikaṃ tannirdhāraṇānyupāsanāni yāni tāni karmasu nityaparṇamayītvādivanna niyamyerannityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2222: eṣāṃ karmāṅgatve taddhīnasyāviduṣaḥ karma na syādaṅgalopāt,
GSP33brsgor3u:2225: tāṃ cedavidvānprastoṣyasi mūrdhā te vyapatiṣyatīti cākrāyaṇenartvijāmākṣiptatvādanupāsakānāmapi karmaprayogo 'stītyāha-prastāvādīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2227: tenomityakṣareṇa yaścaitadakṣaramevaṃ rasatamatvādirūpeṇa vedopāste yaśca na veda tāvubhau karma kuruta eva yadyapi tu vidyāvidyayornānātvaṃ bhinnaphalatvam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2228: dṛṣṭaṃ hi maṇivikraye jñānājñānābhyāṃ vaṇikśabarayoḥ phalavaiṣamyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2229: tasmādyadeva karma vidyayodgīthādyupāstyā śraddhayāstikyabuddhyopaniṣadā rahasyadevatādhyānena karoti tadeva karma phalātiśayavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2230: karmaṇo vīryavattvaṃ nāma phalavattvaṃ vidyāhīnasyāpi gamyamānaṃ vidyāyā anaṅgatve liṅgamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2232: asmai viduṣe kalpante bhogāya samarthā bhavanti bhūmerūrdhvā lokā āvṛttā adhastanāścetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2238: yadyapi parṇamayītvādīnāmaṅgatvabodhakaṃ prakaraṇaṃ nāsti tathāpi teṣu phalaśruteḥ stutitvaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2243: yadapaḥ praṇayettat paśukāmasya sato godohanena brahmavarcasakāmasya kaṃsnyeti phalārthavidhireva nārthavādaḥ godohanādeḥ kratvanākāṅkṣitatvenāṅgatvābhāvāt,
GSP33brsgor3u:2245: tathā khādiratvena nirākāṅkṣakratvaṅgayūpamāśritya bailvamannādyakāmasya khādiraṃ vīryakāmasyeti phalārthavidhirevārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2246: parṇamayītvādiṣu phalavidhiḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-na tviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2250: vidheyaḥ paścānnirākāṅkṣajuhūmāśritya tasyaiva prakṛtidravyasya phalasaṃyogo vidheya
GSP33brsgor3u:2262: astu karmāṅgānāṃ tatsaṃbaddhopāstīnāṃ ca phalabhedānnityatvānityatvarūpaḥ prayogabhedaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2265: 'yataścodeti sūryastaṃ vada'iti praśne sūtrātmakavāyurvācyo vāyusthāne prāṇaṃ vadannekatvaṃ tayordarśayatītyāha-tatheti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2266: kiñca yadi vāyuprāṇayoḥ pṛthagdhyānaṃ syāttarhi dhyānāṅgavratabhedo 'pi syādiha tu prāṇāpānanirodhātmakavrataikyaśruterdhyānaikyamityāha-tasmāditi
GSP33brsgor3u:2268: kiñca vāyuprāṇo saṃvargau bhedenopakramya parastādvākyaśeṣe saṃvargadevaikyaśruteḥ prayogaikyamityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2270: caturaścatuḥ saṃkhyākānagnisūryodakacandrānaparāṃśca vākcakṣuḥśrotramanorūpāneko devaḥ kaḥ prajāpatiḥ jagāra gīrṇavānupasaṃhṛtavānityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2273: sāyaṃprātaḥkālabhedena prayogabhedastathā 'annādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda'ityutpannāyāḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2276: 'tau vā etau dvau saṃvargau'ityupāsyabhedavākyasya prayogabhedaparatvādvākyādeva bhedasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2279: tato 'dhyātmādhidaivāvasthābhedenoktasya dhyeyabhedasya nirāse 'yataścodeti'iti ślokasya na śaktirityāha-śloketi /
GSP33brsgor3u:2282: nanvevakārādvāyuvratanivṛtteḥ prāṇa evaiko dhyeyo bhātītyata āha-ekameveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2283: vadanadarśanādīni vākcakṣurādīnāṃ vratāni śramarūpamṛtyunā bhagnānītyuktvā prāṇasyābhagnavratatvaṃ nirdhāritaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2284: tathā jvalanatāpādīnyagnyādityādīnāṃ vratāni bhagnānītyuktvā vāyorabhagnavratatvaṃ nirdhāritaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2285: 'sa yathaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ sthiravrata evametāsāṃ devanāṃ vāyurlocanti hyanyā devatā na vāyuḥsaiṣānastamitā devatā yadvāyiḥ'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2286: ato bhagnavatanirāsārtha evakāro na vāyuvratanivṛttyartha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2289: tena vratena vāyoḥ sāyujyaṃ samānadehatvaṃ salokatāṃ ca jayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2292: saṃprati pūrvoktaṃ pṛthagupadeśaṃ vivṛṇoti-tathā tau vā iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2294: trayaḥ puroḍāśā asyāṃ santīti tripuroḍāśinīṣṭistasyāṃ kiṃ sahapradānamuta bhedeneti saṃdehe pūrvapakṣamāha-sarveṣāmiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2297: yadvā sarvadevārthaṃ yugapadavadānaṃ kāryamityatra heturacchaṃvaṭkāramiti avyarthatvāyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2298: ekārthamavatte haviṣi śeṣo yāgānarhatayā vṛthā syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2299: evaṃ sahāvadānaśruterdevaikyācca puroḍāśānāṃ sahaprakṣepe prāpte pṛthakprakṣepa iti siddhāntamāha-rājeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2301: kiñcādhvaryuṇā yajeti praiṣe kṛte hotrā yo mantraḥ paṭhyate sā yājyā,
GSP33brsgor3u:2303: tatrāsyāmiṣṭau prathamapuroḍāśapradāne yā kḷptā yājyā sa dvitīyapradāne puronuvākya,
GSP33brsgor3u:2311: karmotpattivākyasthadevatābhedaḥ karmabhede heturiha tvannādo bhavati ya evaṃ vedetyutpattāvekatvena jñātavidyāyāḥ paścācchrutavāyuprāṇabhedo na bhedakaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2319: utpatteḥ prāgidaṃ sarvaṃ naiva sadāsīnnāpyasadityupakramya manaḥ sṛṣṭimuktvā tanmana ātmānamaikṣatetīkṣaṇapūrvakamagnīnapaśyaditi mano 'dhikṛtya paṭhantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2321: tābhiriṣṭakātvena kalpitābhirmanasaiva saṃpāditā agnayo manaścitasthānarkānpūjyānmanovṛttiṣusaṃpāditānātmanaḥ svasya saṃbandhitvena mano 'paśyat,
GSP33brsgor3u:2323: prāṇo ghrāṇaṃ karmendriyeṇa hastādinā citaḥ karmacitaḥ agnistvak pūrvatrāgnicayanaprakaraṇātkimete
GSP33brsgor3u:2327: iha tu manaścidādyagnīnāṃ prakaraṇātkarmāṅgatvenaikaprayogatvamiti prāpayya siddhāntamupakramate-tatretyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:2328: pūrvapakṣe bhāvanāgnīnāṃ kratvaṅgatvamiṣṭaṃ teṣāṃ kriyāṅgatvaṃ vikalpaḥ samuccayo vāstu /
GSP33brsgor3u:2330: tattatra sarvaprāṇimanovṛttibhirmama sadāgnayaḥ cīyanta iti dhyānadārḍhye sati sarvabhūtāni yatkiñcit manasā saṃkalpayanti teṣāmevāgnīnāṃ sā kṛtiḥ karaṇamityekaṃ liṅgaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2332: evaṃvide svapate jāgrate 'pi tadīyāgnīnbhūtāni sarvadā cinvantīti liṅgāntaraṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2339: pūrvasyeṣṭakābhiragniṃ cinuta ityuktasya sa eṣa tviṣṭakāgniriti saṃnihitasyāyaṃ vikalpaviśeṣopadeśaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2347: nanu akriyārūpāgnīnāṃ dhyānamayānāṃ kathaṃ kriyāṅgatvaṃ tatrāha-mānasavaditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:2349: taddharmamāṇāmeva teṣvatideśāttasya madhyadaśarātrasya daśame 'hanyarthādekādaśe 'hani mānasagrahaḥ śrūyate-'anayā tvā pātreṇa samudraṃ rasayā prājāpatyaṃ manograhaṃ gṛhṇāti'iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2350: anayā rasayā pṛthivyā pātreṇa samudraṃ tvāṃ prajāpatidevatākaṃ manograhaṃ gṛhyate iti grahaḥ somarasaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2352: ata evartvijāṃ dhyāyitayā vividhavākyoccāraṇābhāvādavivākyasaṃjñā ahnaḥ prāptaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2354: gṛhītasya svasthāne sthāpanamāsādanaṃ somasya homo havanaṃ hutaśeṣādānamāharaṇaṃ śeṣabhakṣaṇāyartvijāṃ mitho 'nujñānakaraṇamupahvānaṃ tato bhakṣaṇamityetāni mānasānyevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2355: sa ca mānaso graho dvādaśāhādaharantaraṃ svatantramityāśaṅaḍkya dvādaśāhasaṃjñāvirodhānnāharantaraṃ kintu prakaraṇādavivākyasyāhno 'ṅgamiti siddhāntamāha-sa ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2383: sarvadā sarvabhūtāni madarthamagnīn cinvantīti dhyāyedityapūrvārthatayā vidhikalpanāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:2390: saṃpadupāstyai manovṛttiṣu kriyāṅgānāṃ yojanamanubandhaḥ śrutyā kriyate tadanyathānupapattyāpyagnīnāṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:2392: te agnayaḥ, adhīyanta teṣāmādhānaṃ manasaiva kuryādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2399: kiṃ bahūktyā yatkiñcidyajñe karmārādupakārakaṃ yajñiyaṃ yajñasvarūpotpādakaṃ ca tatsarvaṃ manomayaṃ kuryāditi śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2403: anādarārtho 'tideśo na bhavati kintu vikalpārtha ityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2404: ekasminmādhye nirapekṣasādhanayorvikalpo bhavati yathā vrīhiyavayoratra tu kriyāgnerdhyānāgnīnāṃ sādhyabhedānna vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2410: artha iti śeṣaḥ manaścidādīnāṃ svātantraye kriyāprakaraṇādutkarṣaḥ syādityāśaṅkya sa iṣṭa ityāha-dṛṣṭaśceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2411: ekādaśe cintitaṃ 'rājā svārājyakāmo rājasūyena yajeta'iti prakṛtyāveṣṭirnāma kācidiṣṭirāmnātā-'āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo hiraṇyaṃ dakṣiṇā',
GSP33brsgor3u:2415: śrūyate-'yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta bārhaspatyaṃ madhye nidhāyāhutimāhutiṃ hutvābhighārayedyadi vaiśyo vaiśvadevaṃ caruṃ madhye nidadhyādyadi rājanyastadaindram'iti
GSP33brsgor3u:2417: tatrāgneyādicaruṣu aṅgānāṃ tantreṇa prayogo bhavati madhyenidhānaliṅgātprayogabhede madhye nidhānāyogādetayānnādyakāmaṃ yājayedityekavacanācca
GSP33brsgor3u:2418: sa ca tantraprayogo rājasūyakratubāhyāyāmannādyakāmavarṇatrayakartṛkāyāmevāveṣṭau jñeyo na tu kratvantargatāyām /
GSP33brsgor3u:2419: nanu kimatra niyāmakaṃ kratvarthāyāmapyaveṣṭau tantraprayogaḥ kiṃ na syāditi cet / na /
GSP33brsgor3u:2420: varṇatrayasaṃyuktānāṃ kāmyāyāmevāṅgatantraikyasādhakasya madhye nadhānādiliṅgasya sattvādato liṅgaikavacanābhyāṃ tantraikye sati hiraṇyādikā militaikaivā dakṣiṇādheyā,
GSP33brsgor3u:2425: atra caikaprayogaliṅgasya kratvartheṣṭāvasaṃbhavaṃ kāmyeṣṭau ca saṃbhavaṃ vadatānena sūtreṇa kāmyeṣṭeḥ kratvartheṣṭivilakṣaṇatvātkratuprakaraṇādutkarṣa iti sūcitam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2433: kratvarthatvapuruṣārthatvavaiṣamye 'pi mānasatvasāmānyaṃ na virudhyate viṣamayorapi sāmyadarśanādityarthaḥ //51//
GSP33brsgor3u:2436: pareṇa ca śabdasya tādvidhyaṃ bhūyastvāt tv anubandhaḥ / BBs_3,3.52 /
GSP33brsgor3u:2437: kiñca pūrvottarabrāhmaṇayoḥ svatantravidyāvidhānāttanmadhyasthasyāpi brāhmaṇasya svatantravidyāvidhiparatvamityāha-pareṇa ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2438: cite 'gnau lokadṛṣṭividhānaṃ svatantramuttaratra gamyate pūrvatra maṇḍalapuruṣopāstistatsāṃnidhyānmadhye 'pi mānasāgnayaḥ svatantrā ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2439: tarhi kriyāgninā saha pāṭhaḥ kimarthamityata āha-bhūyāṃsastviti //52//
GSP33brsgor3u:2443: manaścidādīnāṃ puruṣārthatvamuktaṃ tadayuktaṃ dehātiriktapuruṣābhāvādityākṣipati-eka ātmanaḥ śarīre bhāvāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:2445: pūrvapakṣe tu paralokārthakarmasu mokṣārthavidyāyāṃ cāpravṛttiriti vyatirekamukhena phalamāha-na hyasatīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2446: vyatiriktātmavicārasya pūrvatantre kṛtatvātpaunaruktyamityāśaṅkya tatratyavicārasyāpīdameva sūtraṃ mūlaṃ jaiminisūtrābhāvādataḥ kva punaruktirityāha-nanu śāstretyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:2447: 'yajñāyudhī yajamānaḥ svargaṃ lokameti'ityādivākyasya bhokturabhāvādaprāmāṇyaprāptāvita evākṛṣya bhokturvicāraḥ kṛta ityatra vṛttikāravacanaṃ liṅgamāha-ata eveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2454: dehātirikta ātmāsti na veti vādivipratipatteḥ saṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha-atraika iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2455: yadyapi samasteṣu militeṣu bhūteṣu caitanyaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ taptodakumbhasya jñānābhāvādvyasteṣu
GSP33brsgor3u:2456: tu nāstyeva tathāpi dehātmakabhūteṣu syāditi tebhyo bhūtebhyaścaitanyaṃ saṃbhāvayanto
GSP33brsgor3u:2458: yathā mādakadravyeṣu tāmbūlapatrādiṣu pratyekamadṛṣṭāpi madaśaktistatsaṃghātājjāyate tadvadityārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2459: nanu dehaḥ svayaṃ na cetanaḥ ghaṭavadbhautikatvāt kintu cetanaḥ kaścitsvargādibhoktāsti tatsāṃnidhyāddehasya caitanyavibhrama ityata āha-na svargeti //53//
GSP33brsgor3u:2463: manuṣyo 'haṃ jānāmiti dehasya jñātṛtāyāḥ pratyakṣatvādātmadharmatvena prasiddhānāṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:2468: tathāca jñānādayo dehavyatiriktāśrayā dehasattve 'pyasattvādvyatirekeṇa deharūpādivadityāha-vyatireka evāsyeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2470: guṇatvasākṣādvyāpyajātyavacchedena asattvasya vivakṣitatvāt dehe 'vasthite sadā rūpatvāvacchinnamastyeva /
GSP33brsgor3u:2471: jñānatvāvacchinnaṃ tu nāstīti na jñānaṃ dehadharmaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2473: kiñca dehavyatirike teṣāmabhāvasya saṃdigdhatvānna dehadharmatvaniścaya ityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2479: dehātmakabhūtānāṃ caitanyaṃ prati viṣayatvātkartṛkarmavirodhena viṣayasya kartṛtvā yogānna bhūtakartṛkatvaṃ caitanyasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2482: yā dehātiriktā sadrūpopalabdhiḥ sa evātmā cedanityaḥ syādupalabdheranityatvādityata āha-nityatvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2483: ghaṭaḥ sphurati paṭaḥ sphuratīti sarvatra sphūrterabhedānnityatvaṃ viṣayoparāganāśe tu nāśabhrama ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2485: kiñca jāgratsvapnayordehabhede 'pyātmaikatvapratyabhijñānādātmabhede cānyānubhūte 'nyasya smṛtīcchānupapatteḥ svapnasmṛtyādimānātmā dehādbhinna ityāha-ahamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2491: ata eva tanvabhāve 'pi svapnavadyogināṃ bhogaṃ sūtrakṛdvakṣyati /
GSP33brsgor3u:2493: tasmāduktānumānugṛhītānmama śarīramiti bhedānubhāvādahaṃ manuṣya ityabhedajñānaṃ bhrama ityupasaṃharati-tasmāditi //54//
GSP33brsgor3u:2496: aṅgāvabaddhāstu na śākhāsu hi prativedam / BBs_3,3.55 /
GSP33brsgor3u:2504: nanūdgīthādīnāṃ sarvaśākhāsvekatvādupāstayaḥ sarvatreti vedyaikyānniścaye kathaṃ saṃśaya ityata āha-pratiśākhaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2505: yathā dehātmanorbhedādātmadharmā dehe na saṃbhavanti tathā prativedamudgīthādīnāṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:2509: sāmānyaśruteḥ saṃnihitavyaktigrahākhyasaṃkocastatra kartavyo yatra vyaktimātragraho nopapadyate,
GSP33brsgor3u:2510: yathā śuklaṃ gāmānayetyatra gośruteḥ saṃnihitaśuklavyaktiparatayā saṃkocaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2515: pūrvaṃ śākhāntaravihitopāstīnāṃ śākhāntarasthāṅgasaṃbandhe yaḥ pratīto virodhastamaṅgīkṛtya saṃbandha uktaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2518: yajurvedināṃ kukkuṭo 'sīti mantro 'sti kuṭarurasīti nāsti tathāpi taṇḍulapeṣaṇārthāśmādāne mantradvayasya vikalpena viniyogātso 'pi prāpnotītyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2522: phsamānatratulyakarmasthale hotavyā iti pañcatvaguṇavidhānādguṇinaḥ śākhāntaravihitāḥ saṃbadhyanta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2524: yajurvedināmagnīṣomīyaḥ paśuḥ śruto nāja iti jātiviśeṣastathāpi praiṣamantraliṅgājjātiviśeṣasaṃgraha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2527: tatheti 'sa janāsa indra'ityanenopalakṣitaṃ sūktaṃ sajanīyaṃ tasya yājuṣādhvaryukartṛkaprayoge śaṃsanaṃ dṛṣṭamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2528: yo jāto bāla eva prathamo guṇaiḥ śroṣṭho manasvānvivekavānsa indra evaṃvidho he jānaso janā iti śrutyarthaḥ //56//
GSP33brsgor3u:2531: bhūmnaḥ kratuvajjyāyastvaṃ tathā hi darśayati / BBs_3,3.57 /
GSP33brsgor3u:2538: vidhiśruteḥ phalaśravaṇasya ca samastopāstisaṃnidhiprāptaṃ stutyarthatvaṃ bādhitvā
GSP33brsgor3u:2541: sutaṃ khaṇḍitaṃ somadravyaṃ tasyaiva prastutvamāsamantāt sutatvamavasthābhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2543: ātmano vaiśvānarasya mūrdheva sutejā iti vākyaprakaraṇābhyāṃ vyastopāstīnāṃ samastopāstyantarbhāvena
GSP33brsgor3u:2555: śāṇḍilyādibrahmavidyaikā nānā vā tathā saṃvargādi prāṇavidyaikā nānā veti rūpaikyabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ saṃśaye dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha-pūrvasminniti
GSP33brsgor3u:2559: siddhānte tu guṇānupasaṃhāra iti matvā sūtraṃ yojayati-vedyābhede 'pīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2560: nanu bhinnabhāvārthavācakaśabdaḥ śabdāntaraṃ yathā 'yajati dadāti juhoti'iti tasmiñśabdabhede
GSP33brsgor3u:2561: karmaśabditavidhyarthabhāvānāyā bhedo yuktastasyāḥ kṛtānubandhatvādbhedena svīkṛtaviṣayatvādbhāvārthabhedāditi yāvat /
GSP33brsgor3u:2562: prakṛte tu vedopāsītetyādiśabdārthopāsteryāgadānahomavatsvato bhedābhāvātsiddhaguṇakabrahmaṇā ekatvena viṣayato 'pi bhedābhāvātkathamupāstibheda iti śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2569: tathā pratividyaṃ phalasaṃyogabhedāddaharaśāṇḍilyādisamākhyābhedādbheda iti samādhatte-naiṣa doṣa ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:2570: yaduktaṃ śrutinānātvaṃ guṇāntaravidhyarthamiti tannetyāha-na cātraika iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2574: vidyānānātvapakṣe tu guṇānāmaprāpteḥ sā prāpyarthetyāha-na cāsminpakṣa iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2576: daharadhyātuḥ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati vaiśvānaradhyātā sarvatrānnamattītyādiphalabheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2577: nanu vidyānānātve siddhe paścāddaharādividyā prativedāntamekānekā veti cintocitā tatkathamādau sā kṛtetyata āha-sthite ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2586: pūrvapakṣe yathecchamanuṣṭhānamityaniyamaḥ siddhānte vikalpenānuṣṭhānamiti niyama iti phalabhedaḥ tatrāniyamaṃ sādhayati-tatra sthitatvādityādinā
GSP33brsgor3u:2587: ekapuroḍāśaphalatvādyathā vrīhiyavayorvikalpastathā vikalpaniyama evāsāṃ vidyānāṃ nyāyyaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:2589: naca phalabhūyastvārthinaḥ kāmyakarmasamuccayo 'pi dṛṣṭa iti vācyam,
GSP33brsgor3u:2591: tasya caikayākṛtatve anyasyāḥ kṛtyābhāvāccittavikṣepakatayā tadvighātakatvācceti siddhāntabhāṣyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2594: addhā īśvaro 'hamiti sākṣātkāraḥ syādvicikitsā ca nāsti ahamīśvaro na veti tasyaiveśvaraprāptirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2595: jīvanneva bhāvanayā devatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtya dehapātottarakālaṃ devānprāpnotīti śrutyantarārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2599: kāmyāstu yathākāmaṃ samuccīyeranna vā pūrvahetvabhāvāt / BBs_3,3.60 /
GSP33brsgor3u:2601: taṭasthopāstayo 'tra viṣayastāsu kiṃ vikalpa uta yathākāmamanuṣṭhānamiti pūrvavatsaṃśaye satyupāstitvāviśeṣādahaṅgrahavadvikalpa iti prāptāvapavādaṃ siddhāntayati-aviśiṣṭeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2602: sa yaḥ kaścidetaṃ vāyumevaṃ gotvena kalpitānāṃ diśāṃ vatsaṃ vedopāste nāsau putramaraṇanimittaṃ rodanaṃ roditi labhate nityameva jīvatputro bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2609: yathā kratvanuṣṭhāne tadāśritāṅgānāṃ samuccityānuṣṭhānaniyamastathāṅgānuṣṭhāne tadāśritopāstīnāṃ tanniyama iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2611: aṅgānyanuṣṭhāpayanprayogavidhiryadyupāsanāni nānuṣṭhāpayettarhi teṣāṃ tadāśritatvaṃ vyarthamiti manvānasya śaṅketi bhāvaḥ //61//
GSP33brsgor3u:2620: upāsanānāṃ tu na kasyacidaṅgasya sthāne vihitatvamiti samuccayaniyamo na virudhyata iti bhāvaḥ //62//
GSP33brsgor3u:2625: 'ṛgvedināṃ yaḥ praṇavaḥ sa sāmavedināmudgīthaḥ'iti chāndogye prāṇavodgīthayoraikyadhyānavidhirasti,
GSP33brsgor3u:2627: hotuḥ śaṃsanasthalavācinā hotṛṣadanaśabdena śaṃsanaṃ lakṣyate-udgātā svarādipramādādduṣṭamapyudgīthaṃ samyakkṛtāddhotṛśaṃsanādanusamāhāratyeva nirdeṣaṃ karotyeva kila,
GSP33brsgor3u:2630: sāmavedasthodgīthadhyānasya ṛgvedoktapraṇavasaṃbandho yo dṛṣṭaḥ sa evāṅgānāṃ sarvavedāntavihitopāstisamuccaye
GSP33brsgor3u:2636: oṅkārasya dhyeyasya sādhāraṇyādapi tadāśritadhyānānāṃ samuccityānuṣṭhānaṃ gamyata iti liṅgāntaramāha-guṇeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2638: vedatrayoktaṃ karma pravartata ityarthaḥ anvayamukhenoktamevārthaṃ vyatirekato 'pi vyācaṣṭe-athaveti //64//
GSP33brsgor3u:2644: prayogavidhiḥ khalu sāṅgapradhānānuṣṭhānaniyāmako na tvanaṅgānāṃ saṃgrahaka ityāha-neti brūma iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2648: samāhārādguṇasādhāraṇyaśruteścetyuktaṃ liṅgadvayamapi mānāntaraprāptasya dyotakaṃ na svayaṃ sādhakamarthavādasthatvādityāha-paraṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2651: idameva teṣāṃ aṅgāśritatvaṃ yadaṅgābhāve satyasattvaṃ na tvaṅgavyāpakatvamityarthaḥ //65//
GSP33brsgor3u:2655: kiñca viduṣā brahmaṇānyeṣāmṛtvijāṃ pālyatvavacanānna sarvopāstīnāṃ sahaprayoga ityāha-darśanācceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2658: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakavyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2664: pūrvapāde parāparavidyānāṃ guṇopasaṃhāroktyā svarūpaṃ niścitamasminpāde tāsāṃ karmānaṅgatayā puruṣārthahetutvaṃ nirūpyate /
GSP33brsgor3u:2665: tato 'ṅgākāṅkṣāyāṃ yajñādīni bahiraṅgāni śamāddīnyantaraṅgāni ca nirūpyanta ityekavidyāviṣayatvaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:2666: pādayoḥ saṃgatiḥ tatrādau tattvajñānaṃ viṣayīkṛtya vādivipratipattyā saṃśayamāha-atheti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2679: aṅgiphalenāṅgabhūta ātmāvagataprayojanastadāśraye tatsaṃskāre jñāne phalaśrutirarthavāda ityatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ-yatheti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2684: ātmajñānaṃ na karmāṅgaṃ mānābhāvāditi siddhāntī śaṅkate-kathamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2686: yukto hyanārabhyādhītāyāḥ parṇatāyā juhūdvāreṇa vākyātkratvaṅgabhāvo juhvāḥ kratuvyāpyatayā kratūpasthāpakatvāt,
GSP33brsgor3u:2689: dehabhinnatvena jñātātmanaḥ kratuvyāpyatvamastīti pūrvapakṣī samādhatte-na vyatireketi /
GSP33brsgor3u:2693: yasyārthe jāyādikaṃ priyaṃ bhogyaṃ sa ātmā draṣṭavya iti bhogyaliṅgena sūcitabhoktṛbhinnamakartṛsvarūpaṃ nāstīti samādhyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2694: janmādisūtramārabhya sādhitaṃ svarūpaṃ kathaṃ nāstīti śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2702: he bhagavanta iti brāhmaṇānsaṃbodhya brahmavitkaikeyarājo brūte ahaṃ yakṣyamāṇo yāgaṃ kariṣyamāṇo 'smi vasantvatra bhagavanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2704: alpāyāsaṃ mukterūpāyaṃ jñānaṃ labdhvā bahvāyāsaṃ karma na kuryurityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-akva iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2715: taṃ paralokaṃ gacchantaṃ vidyākarmaṇī anugacchata ityarthaḥ //5//
GSP33brsgor3u:2719: guroḥ śuśrūṣārūpaṃ karma kurvannatiśeṣeṇāvaśiṣṭena kālena yathāvidhānaṃ vedamadhītyānantaramācāryasya kulādgṛhāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:2721: abhisamāvartanaṃ kṛtvā kuṭumbe gārhasthye sthitaḥ pratyahaṃ śucau deśe svādhyāyādhyayanaṃ kurvannanyāṃśca nityādidharmānanutiṣṭhanbrahmalokaṃ prāpnotīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2723: dṛṣṭer'thāvabodhākhye phale saṃbhavati adhyayanasyādṛṣṭārthatvāyogāditi pūrvatantre sthitam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2724: tataśca brahmāpi vedārtha iti tadavabedhavataḥ karmavidhānamityarthaḥ //6//
GSP33brsgor3u:2729: iha dehe karmāṇi kurvanneva śataṃ saṃvatsarāñjīvitumicchedevaṃ karmitvena jīvati tvayi nare karma pāpaṃ na lipyate /
GSP33brsgor3u:2737: asya mahata iti vākyaśeṣātpriyasaṃsūcita ātmā para eva draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2739: tathākṣipuruṣo 'pyavasthāsākṣi parañjyotiriti vākyaśeṣātpara iti vibhāgaḥ jīvānukarṣaṇamabhedābhiprāyamityaṅgīkāre na virodha iti katham,
GSP33brsgor3u:2741: jñānaṃ karmāṅgamaphalatve sati karmaśeṣāśrayatvādityukto heturasiddha iti bhāvaḥ //8//
GSP33brsgor3u:2746: brahmavidāṃ karmavatsaṃnyāsasyāpi darśanātteṣāṃ karmadarśanātmakaṃ liṅgaṃ lokasaṃgrahārthatvenānyathāsiddhamityāha-tulyaṃ tviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2747: kiñca yasya karma sa na brahmavidityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2749: brahmavidāṃ lokasaṃgrahārthaṃ kriyamāṇamapi karma na bhavati abhimānābhāvenānadhikāritvāditi bhāvaḥ // 9 // //10//
GSP33brsgor3u:2753: samanvārambhavacanasya mumukṣuviṣayatvamaṅgīkṛtya vidyā anyaṃ mumukṣuṃ muktatvenānvārabhata iti vibhāga uktaḥ sūtrakṛtāḥ vastutastu tannāstītyāha-nacedaṃ samanvārambhavacanamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2754: tatra saṃsāriviṣaye taṃ vidyetyādivākye yathāprāptānuvādini vidyādipadārthamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2762: mātrapadamātmajñānasya vyāvartakaṃ na karmajñānasyetyāha-naiṣa doṣa iti // 12 // //13//
GSP33brsgor3u:2767: evaṃ karma kurvityapi tvayi nare neto vidyālabdhādbrahmabhāvādanyathāsti karmaṇā saṃsāro nāstīti yāvat /
GSP33brsgor3u:2774: tadetadbrahma yeṣāṃ no 'smākaṃ ayamaparokṣa ātmā ayameva lokaḥ puruṣārthaste vayaṃ kiṃ prajādinā kariṣyāma ityālocya karma tyaktavanta ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2775: nanvayaṃ loka iti jñānaphalasya pratyakṣatvoktirayuktā karmaphalavadadṛṣṭatvādityata āha-anubhaveti //15//
GSP33brsgor3u:2779: na kevalamanupayogājjñānasya karmānaṅgatvaṃ kintu karmanāśakatvāccetyāha-upamardaṃ ceti //16//
GSP33brsgor3u:2784: trayo dharmaskandhāḥ karmapradhānā āśramāścaturtho brahmasaṃstha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2785: 'brahmacaryeṇa ṛṣibhyo yajñena devebhyaḥ prajayā pitṛbhya eva vā anṛṇaḥ'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2787: anapākṛtya mokṣaṃ tu sevamāno vrajatyadhaḥ'iti smṛteśca prāptagārhasthyasyaiva nirastarṇatrayasya pārivrājyamityapi śaṅkā na kāryā /
GSP33brsgor3u:2794: ūrdhvaretaḥ śabditaṃ pārivrājyamanuṣṭheyaṃ na veti mānabhrāntimūlatvābhyāṃ saṃdehe bhrāntimūlatvānnānuṣṭheyamityāha-traya iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2799: yastu vedasya grahaṇāntaṃ brahmacaryaṃ carati sa brāhmaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2803: gṛhastho 'pi caturvidhaḥ vārtāko yāyāvaraḥ śālīno ghorasaṃnyasikaśceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2807: uddhṛtaparipūtābhiradbhiḥ kāryaṃ kurvanpratyahaṃ kṛtoñchavṛttirgrāmavāsī ghorasaṃnyasika ityucyate,
GSP33brsgor3u:2809: vānaprastho 'pi caturvidhaḥ vaikhānasa audumbaro vālakhilyaḥ phenapaśceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2811: yastu prātaruthāya yāṃ diśaṃ paśyati tatratyaudumbarabadarīnīvāraśyāmākaiḥ karmaparaḥ sa audumbaraḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2812: yastu jaṭāvalkaladhārī aṣṭau prātasānvṛttyupārjanaṃ kṛtvā cāturmāsye saṃgṛhītāśī kārtikyāṃ saṃgṛhītapuṣpaphalatyāgī sa vālakhilyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2813: phenapāstu śīrṇaparṇaphalavṛttayo yatra kvacidvasantaḥ karmaparā iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2814: tathā parivrājākāścaturvidhāḥ kuṭīcakā bahūdakā haṃsāḥ paramahaṃsāśceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2816: bahūdakāstu tridaṇḍinaḥ śikyajalapavitrapādukāsanaśikhāyajñopavītakaupīnakāṣāyaveṣadhārāstīrthānyaṭanto bhaikṣaṃ caranta ātmānaṃ prārthayante
GSP33brsgor3u:2817: haṃsāstu ekadaṇḍinaḥ śikhāvarjaṃ yajñopavītadharāḥ śikyakamaṇḍalupāṇayaḥ grāmaikarātravāsinaḥ kṛcchracāndrāyaṇaparāḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2818: paramahaṃsāstvekadaṇḍadharā muṇḍā ayajñopavītinaḥ tyaktasarvakarmāṇa ātmaniṣṭhā iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2819: atra pūrvapakṣe saṃnyāsābhāvāñjñānasya svatantraphalatvāsiddhiḥ siddhānte tadbhāvāttatsiddhiriti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2820: skandhā āśramāḥ ātmānaṃ śarīramācāryasya kule gṛhe karśayannaiṣṭhika ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2821: skandhaśrutāvāśramā na vidhīyante kintu brahmasaṃsthatāsturthamanūdyanta ityukte śaṅkate-nanu parāmarśe 'pīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2823: pratyakṣā skandhaśrutireva purovādo 'stu nānuvāda ityata āha-smṛtīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2826: asyā anuvādatve tu mūlatvena sāgnikānagnikāśramaśrutistatra vidhiśceti dvayakalpanāgauravādityata āha-ataśceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2837: ātmaloko mahīyān yadarthamaśakyāṃ pravrajyāmapi kurvantīti stutirvartamānāpadeśādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2844: nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ prācīnāvītaṃ pitṛṇāmupavītaṃ devānāmiti vākye daive karmaṇyupavītaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33brsgor3u:2846: mānuṣakriyāsu dehārdhavastrabandhanākhyanivītasya saukaryārtatayā prāptatvāt pitrye karmaṇi prācīnāvītasyāpi vidhyantaraprāptatvādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2860: idānīṃ vidhitvaṃ tasyā eva kalpyaṃ lāghavādityāha-vidhirveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2867: mahāpitṛyajñe pretāgnihotre ca sruci prakṣiptaṃ havirāhavanīyaṃ prati yadā nīyate
GSP33brsgor3u:2869: hītyasyaikavākyatvabhāne 'pi daive home srugdaṇḍopari samiddhāraṇe vidhirevāpūrvatvāditi
GSP33brsgor3u:2871: evaṃ catvāra āśramā vidhīyanta iti pakṣa uktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2874: nanu traya iti vākya āśramacatuṣṭayasyāprāpternirbījo 'yaṃ vicāra ityāśaṅkya tadvākye parivrājakaḥ parāmṛṣṭo na veti saṃdihyādye pūrvapakṣaprāptimāha-yadiceti
GSP33brsgor3u:2875: nanvanāśramyeva brahmasaṃsthaḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-anāśramitveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2879: vanasthasya hyasādhāraṇaṃ kṛcchrādikaṃ tapa iti prasiddham /
GSP33brsgor3u:2882: sa ca stutisāmarthyāt saha brahmasaṃsthayā vidhīyata iti siddhāntayati-tadayuktamityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:2883: pṛthagvyapadeśācca brahmasaṃsthaḥ pūrvoktebhya āśramibhyaḥ pṛthagbhūta ityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2885: kālabhedenāpi sati mandaprajñatve prajñādhikyavatsati karmitve teṣāṃ vikṣiptacetasāṃ brahmasaṃsthānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2886: karmatyāge ca parivrāḍeva brahmasaṃstha ityasmadiṣṭasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2888: yadyapi brahmasaṃsthaśabdaḥ saṃnyāsāśrame na rūḍhastathāpi yogāttamevopasthāpayati /
GSP33brsgor3u:2891: nyāsaḥ saṃnyāso brahmeti stutau hetumāha-brahmā hīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2892: hiraṇyagarbho hi para iti prasiddhaḥ ato brahmatvena stutaḥ saṃnyāsaḥ para eveti stutvā karmāṇi nindati tānīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2893: tato nyāsa eva jñānadvārā mocakatvādadhika ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2894: tadbuddhaye brahmacittāstadātmāno brahmasvarūpāstanniṣṭhāḥ śravaṇādiparāstatparāyaṇāḥ brahmaprepsavaḥ niṣkāmā iti yāvat /
GSP33brsgor3u:2907: sakalāṅgānameva kathañcitkarmānadhikṛtānāṃ saṃnyāso yuktaḥ vikalāṅgānāṃ tvandhādīnāṃ na jñānapradhānasaṃnyāsādhikāra ityāha-brahmeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2916: stutimātram upādānād iti cen nāpūrvatvāt / BBs_3,4.21 /
GSP33brsgor3u:2918: pṛthivyaboṣadhipuruṣavāgṛksāmnāṃ saptānāṃ rasānāṃ rasatamo 'ṣṭama udgīthāvayava oṅkāraḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:2919: paramaḥ paramātmapratīkatvātparasya brahmaṇor'dhaṃ sthānaṃ tadarhatīti parārdhyaṃ ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2921: yathānuṣṭheyagārhasthyasāmyaśruteḥ pārivrājyasyānuṣṭheyatvaṃ tadvadāsāṃ śrutīnāṃ juhvādistutiśrutisāmyātstutitvamiti pūrvapakṣayati-stutyarthā iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2927: pūrvapakṣe svananuṣṭhānaṃ phalaṃ siddhānte tvanuṣṭhānaṃ phalamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2934: kiñcātra vidhikalpya iti kṛtvācintayoktaṃ vastutastu na kalpyaḥ kḷptatvādityāha-bhāveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2937: devo madiṣṭaṃ kuryāditi prārthanādāvapi liṅgādiprayogādupāsītetyādiśabdānāṃ kathaṃ vidhiparatvaniścaya ityata āha-tathāceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2941: naca śloke pañcamamityukteḥ pañcapadānāmeva vidhilakṣaṇatvaṃ nopāsītetyādīnāmiti bhramitavyam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2942: kriyāsāmānyavācināṃ kṛbhvastīnāmudāharaṇena sarvadhātūparaktaliṅādīnāṃ vidhilakṣaṇatvasya vivakṣitatvātpañcamapadaṃ tūktāpekṣayā ślokapūraṇārthaṃ mṛtyurdhāvati pañcama itivat /
GSP33brsgor3u:2943: yadyapi ḍukṛñ karaṇa iti dhātereva karaṇaśabditabhāvanākhyakriyāsāmānyavācitvaṃ netarayordhātvorbhū
GSP33brsgor3u:2946: tatra kuryāditi prakṛtyarthabhāvanākhyātenānūdyate yathā dvāviti prayoge prakṛtyartho dvitvaṃ pratyayenānūdyate /
GSP33brsgor3u:2951: ākhyātānāṃ kartrādikārake śaktya bhāvātkartṛkarmaṇorākṣepa eveti mīmāṃsakamatam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2954: tathā daṇḍī bhavet bhūyate daṇḍinā bhavitavyamityudāhartavyam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2958: dhātūnāṃ pratyayānāṃ kartrādikārakāṇāṃ ca bhede 'pi vidhibhedo nāstīti jñāpanārthaṃ pratidhātūdāharaṇatrayaṃ darśitamiti sarvamavadātam /
GSP33brsgor3u:2959: evaṃ sūtre bhāvo vidhiriti vyākhyāya caśabdātphalamiti vyācaṣṭe-pratiprakaraṇaṃ iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2960: eṣa ṛtvigupāsakaḥ kāmāgānasya gānena phalasaṃpādanasyeṣṭe samartha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2961: evamaṅgāśritavidyā api svatantraphalāḥ kimu vaktavyamanaṅgātmavidyāyāḥ svātantryamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2965: pāriplavārthā iti cen na viśeṣitatvāt / BBs_3,4.23 /
GSP33brsgor3u:2967: aśvamedhe putrādiparivṛtāya rājñe pāriplavamācakṣīteti nānāvidhākhyānakathanātmakaḥ pāriplavaprayogo vihitaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2970: tathaiva kathānāṃ na vidyāstāvakatvaṃ pāriplavānuṣṭhānalābhāditi pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2972: yathā devasya tvā saviturityādimantre kasyacitpadasya prayogasamavetārthatayā śeṣasya prayogāṅgatvaṃ tathā vedāntasthakathānāṃ prayogaśeṣatvam
GSP33brsgor3u:2974: kathānāṃ guruśiṣyasamācārapradarśanena buddhisaukaryadvārā saṃnihitavidyāśeṣatvaṃ sāmardhyaliṅgādato vidyāprādhānyamiti phalaṃ matvā siddhāntayati-tannetyādinā
GSP33brsgor3u:2975: aśvamedhe prathama'hani manurvaivasvata iti kathāṃ brūyāddvitīye 'hani yamo vaivasvata
GSP33brsgor3u:2976: iti tṛtīye 'hani varuṇa āditya iti vākyaśeṣe kathānāṃ viśiṣyoktatvādupakramasya saṃkoco
GSP33brsgor3u:2982: prarocanaṃ prītijananaṃ sa prajāpatirvapāmudakhidat homāyoddhṛtavānityasya prājāpatyamajaṃ tūparamālabheteti vidhiśeṣatve evamanyeṣāṃ tattadvidhiśeṣatvaṃ draṣṭavyam //24//
GSP33brsgor3u:2986: evamādyādhikaraṇaprameyaṃ vidyāsvātantryamadhikaraṇatrayeṇa dṛḍhīkṛtyādyādhikaraṇasya phalamāha-ata eva ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2987: brahmavidyā svaphale mokṣe janayitavye sahakāritvena karmāṇyapekṣate na veti vādivivādātsaṃśaye
GSP33brsgor3u:2989: iti prāpte vidyāyā muktihetutvādavidyānivṛttyākhyamuktau na karmāpekṣeti siddhāntayati-puruṣārtha iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2991: puṇyakṛttaijasaḥ śuddhasatve brahmavidbhūtvā tena vedanenaiti brahma prāpnotīti śrutirvyākhyeyeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2992: muktāveva karmaṇāmasāmarthyādanapekṣā vidyāyāṃ tvasti cittaśuddhidvārā teṣāmapekṣetyadhikaṃ vaktumayamupasaṃhāra ityupasaṃhārasūtrasya phalamāha-adhiketi
GSP33brsgor3u:2997: yathā pramāphalatvādavidyānivṛttau karmānapekṣā tathā pramātvādvidyāyāmapi pramākaraṇamātrasādhyāyāṃ nāsti karmāpekṣeti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3000: atra vividiṣāyāmiṣyamāṇajñāne vā yajñādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ hetutvamapūrvatvādvidhīyate /
GSP33brsgor3u:3007: kaṣāye karmabhiḥ pakve tato jñānaṃ pravartate'iti smṛteḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3008: 'avidyayā mṛtyuṃ tīrtvā vidyayāmṛtamaśnute'ityādiśrutyā karmaṇā pāpanivṛttau jñānena muktyabhidhānācceti siddhāntayati-idamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3009: nanvatra vividiṣantīti pañcamalakāreṇa vividiṣāṃ bhāvayeyuriti sanarthecchaiva bhāvyatayā bhāti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3010: tāṃ viṣayasaundaryalabhyatayollaṅghya vedanaṃ cedbhāvyamucyate tarhi vedanamapyullaṅghya tatphalaṃ mokṣa eva karmabhirbhāvyaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-vividiṣāsaṃyogācceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3011: iṣyamāṇatayā vidyāyāḥ śabdataḥ phalatvabhānādaśrutamokṣo na phalamanyathā kāṣṭhaiḥ pacatītyatrāpi kāṣṭhānāṃ pākaphalatṛptihetutvaprasaṅgāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3014: kaścittu jñānārthakarmadvāreti matvā sarve vedāntā ityuktam /
GSP33brsgor3u:3018: śamadamādyupetas syāt tathāpi tu tadvidhes tadaṅgatayā teṣām apy avaśyānuṣṭheyatvāt / BBs_3,4.27 /
GSP33brsgor3u:3022: śamāderāvaśyakatvānna śabdamātralabhyā vidyetyarthaḥ yasmādevaṃvinna lipyate karmaṇā
GSP33brsgor3u:3023: pāpakena tasmādeva vidyārthī śamādyupeto bhūtvā vicārayediti vidhirgamyata ityāha-neti brūma iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3024: atroparatapadena saṃnyāsa uktastasya śravaṇāṅgatvamate śamādiviśiṣṭaśravaṇamatra vidhīyate /
GSP33brsgor3u:3028: paśyediti ca prakṛtyā śravaṇalakṣaṇādoṣācca saṃnyāso na śravaṇasyāṅgaṃ kintu tataḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:3029: prāganuṣṭhoyatve 'pi śravaṇavajjñānārtha iti mataṃ tadā śamādisamuccayena jñānaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:3031: yaḥ pūrvaṃ yajñādiśruteḥ stutyarthatvāṅgīkāraḥ āpātato guḍajihvikānyāyena śamādisvīkārārthaṃ kṛtastamidānīṃ tyajati-yajñādīnyapīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3036: tatra pūṣā devatā piṣṭabhāgo vā darśapūrmamāsayornāsti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3039: pūṣoddeśena piṣṭabhāgaḥ kartavya iti vikṛtau saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3042: karmaṇāṃ jñānahetutve śamādivadyāvajjñānodayamanuvṛttiḥ syāttathāca saṃnyāsābhāva ityata āha-tatrāpīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3043: dṛṣṭavikṣepanivṛttidvārā śamādīnāṃ śānārthatvādanuvṛttirna karmaṇāmadṛṣṭadvārā jñānārthatvāditi bhāvaḥ //27//
GSP33brsgor3u:3046: sarvān nānumatiś ca prāṇātyaye taddarśanāt / BBs_3,4.28 /
GSP33brsgor3u:3052: atra bhakṣyābhakṣyaniyamatyāgasya vidyāṅgatvasiddhiḥ phalaṃ siddhānte tu vidyāstutiriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3054: yathā grāmyakarmaṇi vāmadevyasāmopāsakavyatiriktaviṣayaṃ parastrīniṣedhaśāstraṃ tadvaditi prāpte siddhāntaṃ sūtrādbahireva darśayati-nedamiti
GSP33brsgor3u:3055: prāṇavidyāvidhisaṃnidheraśakyatvācca stutireva na vidhiḥ kalpyaḥ niṣedhaśāstravirodhāt kḷpto hi vidhiḥ sāmānyaśāstrabādhako natu kalpya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3056: svasthasya prāṇavido na sarvānnānumatirityatra liṅgaṃ vadan sūtraṃ yojayati-taddarśayatīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3057: maṭacyo raktakṣudrapakṣiṇastairhateṣu kurudeśasthasasyeṣu durbhikṣe jāte bālayā saha
GSP33brsgor3u:3058: jāyayā munirdeśāntaraṃ gacchannibhyāgrāme sthitavānibhyo hastipālakastena sāmikhāditānardhabhakṣitān
GSP33brsgor3u:3060: ibhvena jalaṃ gṛhāṇetyukte satyucchiṣṭaṃ vai me pītaṃ syāditi pratiṣidhya māṣāḥ kiṃ nocchiṣṭā itībhyenokte sati māṣabhakṣaṇe jalatyāge ca kāraṇamuvāca
GSP33brsgor3u:3062: jalapānaṃ tu svecchātastaḍāgādau labhyata iti māṣān khāditvāvaśiṣṭāñjāyāyai dattavān /
GSP33brsgor3u:3063: sā cānāpadgatā patyurāpadaṃ jñātvā māṣānsaṃrakṣya prātastasmai dadau /
GSP33brsgor3u:3064: sa ca tān khāditvā rājño yajñaṃ gatvā prastotrādīnākṣipya prāṇādikāṃ prāstāvādidevatāmupadīśya dhanaṃ prāpya sthita iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3065: atrocchiṣṭabhakṣaṇajalatyāgātmakaśiṣṭācāraliṅgācchrautādanāpadi viduṣāpyabhakṣyaṃ na bhakṣaṇīyamiti sūcyata iti bhāvaḥ // 28 // //29//
GSP33brsgor3u:3069: surāpānenāpi jīvanamāśaṅkya kadāpi tanna kāryamityāha-tathā madyaṃ nityaṃ brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3078: kāmakāro yatheṣṭapravṛttiḥ so 'pi niṣedho 'pi upapannataro bhavati /
GSP33brsgor3u:3080: yadyayamapi vidhiḥ syāttarhi vihitapratiṣiddhatvātṣoḍaśigrahaṇāgrahaṇavatsurāpāne vikalpaḥ syātsa ca sarvasmṛtibhiḥ śiṣṭācāreṇa ca viruddha iti tātparyārthaḥ //31//
GSP33brsgor3u:3089: tasyā anityatvādyāvajjīvādividhinā tu nityatvaṃ ceti viruddhadharmadvayāpātādvividiṣāśruteḥ stutitvamiti phalaṃ pūrvapakṣe /
GSP33brsgor3u:3094: saha militvā śuddhidvārā vidyāṃ kurvantīti sahakārīṇi karmāṇi /
GSP33brsgor3u:3098: ato vihitāni karmāṇi avihitāyā na sahakāryaṅgāni mokṣasyāsādhyatvācca na karmāṇāṃ sahakāritvasaṃbhava ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3100: kāmanāyā anityatve 'pi karmaṇāṃ nānityatvaṃ nityavidhinā prayogasya nityatvāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:3103: yathā 'khādiro yūpo bhavati'iti śrutyā khādiratvasya kratvarthatā khādiraṃ vīryakāmasyeti śrutyā puruṣārthatā ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3104: ataḥ sati vākyadvaye viniyuktaviniyogo na virudhyata ityarthaḥ //33//
GSP33brsgor3u:3108: nanu nityāgnihotrādibhyo bhinnā evāpūyarvajñādayo vividiṣāyāṃ viniyujyantāṃ tatra kuto viniyuktaviniyogastatrāha-sarvathāpīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3114: siddhakarmasu saṃskāratvaprasiddhirapi śuddhākhyasaṃskāradvārā jñānārthakakarmābhede liṅgamityāha-yasyaita iti //34//
GSP33brsgor3u:3124: anāśramiṇāṃ japādikarmasattvānninditatvācca saṃśaye sati āśramakarmaṇāmeva vidyāhetutvaśruteranāśramasya ninditatvāccānadhikāra iti pūrvapakṣaḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:3130: raikvādīnāṃ vidyāvattvaliṅgasya janmāntarāśramakarmaṇānyathāsiddheranāśramakarmaṇo vidyārthatvaprāpakaṃ mānāntaraṃ vācyamiti śaṅkate-nanu liṅgamiti
GSP33brsgor3u:3133: nanvanāśramiṇāṃ karma bhavatu vidyāhetustathāpi teṣāṃ na śravaṇādāvadhikāraḥ saṃnyāsābhāvādityata āha-dṛṣṭārthā ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3135: saṃnyāso 'pi kadācitkṛto jñāna upakaroti śravaṇaṃ pratyanaṅgatvāditi bhāvaḥ //38//
GSP33brsgor3u:3138: atas tv itarajjyāyo liṅgāc ca / BBs_3,4.39 /
GSP33brsgor3u:3141: atra puṇyakṛttvaliṅgādāśramitvaṃ jyāyaḥ puṇyopacaye śīghraṃ vidyālābhādanāśramasya ninditatvācceti bhāvaḥ //39//
GSP33brsgor3u:3144: tadbhūtasya tu nātadbhāvo jaiminer api niyamāt tadrūpābhāvebhyaḥ / BBs_3,4.40 /
GSP33brsgor3u:3146: uttamāśramātpūrvāśramaṃ prāptasya pracyutasya karmāpi vidyāheturanāśramikarmavaditi saṃgatiḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:3148: siddhānte tu bhraṣṭasya karma na heturiti phalam /
GSP33brsgor3u:3149: rāgādiprābalyātpracyutiniṣedhācca pracyutiḥ prāmāṇikī na veti saṃśayamāhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3153: tadiyādgacchediti padaṃ śāstramārgastatastasmātpārivrājyānna punareyānna pracyavediti uniṣadrahasyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3156: 'caṇḍālāḥ pratyavasitāḥ'iti smṛteśca patitānāṃ karma niṣphalamiti bhāvaḥ //40//
GSP33brsgor3u:3159: na cādhikārikam api patanānumānāt tadayogāt / BBs_3,4.41 /
GSP33brsgor3u:3163: atra pracyutasya prāyaścittaṃ syānnaveti upapātakatvātpatanasmṛteśca saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3164: pracyutasya yajñādikaṃ niṣphalamityuktaṃ tadvatprāyaścittamāpi niṣphalamiti pūrvapakṣayati-netyucyata iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3165: atra kṛtaprāyaścittasya karma jñānaheturna bhavatīti phalaṃ siddhānte tu bhavatītidaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3168: brahmacāriṇaḥ prāyaścittapaśurgardabho laukikāgnau hotavya ityadhikāralakṣaṇe ṣaṣṭhādhyāye
GSP33brsgor3u:3169: nirṇītaṃ prāyaścittamādhikārikaṃ tadupakurvāṇasyaiva na naiṣṭhikasyeti prāpte siddhāntayati //41 //
GSP33brsgor3u:3172: upapūrvam api tv eke bhāvamaśanavat tad uktam / BBs_3,4.42 /
GSP33brsgor3u:3175: 'prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmi'iti darśanābhāvasmṛteḥ prāyaścittābhāvāparatvaṃ kalpayitvā tanmūlaśrutikalpanātprāgeva kḷptasādhāraṇaśrutyā prāyaścittasadbhāvasiddheḥ
GSP33brsgor3u:3177: prāyaścittasya bhāvābhāvasiddhyoḥ samatve 'pi bhāvaprasiddhiḥ śrutimūlatvādādartavyetyatra saṃmatimāha-taduktamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3179: ataḥ kasya caruḥ kārya iti saṃdehe vṛddhaprayogasāmyātsamā tulyā vikalpena pratipattiḥ syāditi prāpte siddhāntaḥ-śāstramūlā pratipattirgrāhyā śāstranimittatvāddharmādijñānasya /
GSP33brsgor3u:3183: brahmacaryarakṣārthaṃ yatnādhikyaṃ kāryamiti jñāpanārthaṃ prāyaścittaṃ spaṣṭamapi na paśyāmītyuktaṃ bhagavadatriṇetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3185: kṛcchraṃ prājāpatyaṃ mahākakṣaṃ bahutṛṇakāṣṭhadeśaṃ jaladānādinā vardhayeta /
GSP33brsgor3u:3199: bahis tūbhayathāpi smṛter ācārāc ca / BBs_3,4.43 /
GSP33brsgor3u:3201: kṛtaprāyaścittaistaiḥ saha kṛtaśravaṇādikaṃ jñānasādhanaṃ na veti saṃdehe teṣāṃ śuddhatvātsādhanamiti
GSP33brsgor3u:3202: prāpte prāyaścittātparaloke teṣāṃ śuddhatve 'pyatra śuddhabhāvānna sādhanamiti siddhāntayati-yadyūrdhveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3209: yaḥ kṛtaprāyaścittaḥ sa saṃvyavahārya ityutsargasya nindātiśayasmṛtyā naiṣṭhikādiṣu
GSP33brsgor3u:3210: bādhavadyo yadaṅgakartā sa tadāśritasya kartetyutsargasya kartuḥ phalaśrutyā bādha
GSP33brsgor3u:3212: atra kartṛtvabhoktṛtvayoraikādhikaraṇyaṃ phalaṃ siddhānte tvaṅgāśritā ṛtvikkartṛkā
GSP33brsgor3u:3213: apyupāstayo yajamānagāmisvatantraphalāḥ kimu vācyaṃ svaniṣṭhabrahmavidyāyāḥ svātantryamiti
GSP33brsgor3u:3215: ataḥ pādasaṃgatiḥ hiṅkāraprastāvodgīthapratihāranidhanākhyapañcaprakāre sāmni vṛṣṭidhyāturvarṣasamṛddhiḥ phalamiti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3216: śrutaṃ phalaṃ ṛtviggataṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-tacceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3218: astu tasya phalaṃ tadgataṃ kartātvanyaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-phalaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3225: ārtvijyam ity auḍulomiḥ tasmai hi parikrīyate / BBs_3,4.45 /
GSP33brsgor3u:3228: tamudgīthākhyaṃ praṇavaṃ prāṇadṛṣṭyā dhyātavāndhyātvā ca naimiśīyānāṃ satriṇāmudgātāsīdityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3229: yajamānena svagāmiphalakasāṅgaprayogakaraṇāyartvijāṃ krītatvātkartṛtve 'pi na tatphalabhāktvamutsargasya bādhakābhāvādityuktatvāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:3230: krayaṇadvārā kartṛtvabhoktṛtvasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ copapadyate bhṛtyakartṛke yuddhe rājā yudhyate jayati cetivaditi bhāvaḥ // 45 // //46//
GSP33brsgor3u:3233: sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyaṃ tadvato vidhyādivat / BBs_3,4.47 /
GSP33brsgor3u:3235: yasmātpūrve brāhmaṇā ātmānaṃ viditvā saṃnyasya bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti tasmādadyatano
GSP33brsgor3u:3236: 'pi brāhmaṇa āpātajñānarūpapaṇḍāvānpaṇḍitastasya kṛtyaṃ pāṇḍityaṃ śravaṇaṃ tannirvidya
GSP33brsgor3u:3237: niścayena labdhvā bālyena śravaṇajajñānasya balabhāvena mananenāsaṃbhāvanānirāsena
GSP33brsgor3u:3238: bālasya bhāvena vā śuddhacittatvena sthātumicchedevaṃ mananaśravaṇe kṛtvādānantaraṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:3239: munirnididhyāsanakṛtsyādevamamaunaṃ ca maunādanyadbālyapāṇḍityadvayaṃ maunaṃ ca nididhyāsanaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:3240: labdhvā atha jñānasāmagrīpauṣkalyānantaraṃ brahmāhamiti sākṣātkāravān brāhmaṇo bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3241: maunaśabdasya siddharūpe pārivrājye anuṣṭheye ca dhyāne prayogātsaṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3242: yathā taṃ ha baka ityādivākyaśeṣādudgīthādyupāsanasyārtvijyatvanirṇayastadvadatha brāhmaṇa iti vidhihīnavākyaśeṣānmaunasyāpyavidheyatvaniścaya iti pūrvapakṣamāha-na vidhīyata iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3244: yadi maunaṃ pārivrājyaṃ tadā vākyāntaraprāptamanūdyate bālyavidhipraśaṃsārtham /
GSP33brsgor3u:3250: kiñcāmaunaṃ ca maunaṃ ca nirvidyeti śravaṇamananavadanuṣṭheyatvoktermaunasya vidheyatetyāha-nirvedanīyatveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3255: sūkṣmārthasākṣātkārasādhanatvena dhyānādeḥ ṣaḍjādau lokataḥ prāptiṃ śaṅkitvā niyamavidhimāha-nanvityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:3256: nanu brahmavidyāpare vākye kathaṃ jñānāṅgamiti cetsaphalakratuparavākye 'ṅgavidhivadityāha-vidhyādivaditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:3258: tatra pradhānaḥ kraturvidhyādirata evāṅgaṃ vidhyanta ityucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3264: samāvartanānantaraṃ kuṭumbe sthito brahmalokaṃ prāpnoti naca punarāvartata ityupasaṃhārātsaṃnyāso nāstīti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3278: tatra bālye viṣaye taddhitasya bhāvārthatvāsaṃbhavātkarmārthatvaṃ gṛhītvā tiṣṭhanmūtratvādikarmaṇo 'prarūḍhendriyatvādirūpabhāvaśuddheśca bālakarmatvāviśeṣātsaṃśayamāha-tatreti
GSP33brsgor3u:3279: pūrvapakṣe vidyāṅgatvena tiṣṭhanmūtratvāderapyanuṣṭhānaṃ siddhānte bhāvaśuddhereveti phalam /
GSP33brsgor3u:3280: pūrvatra maunaśabdasya jñānātiśaye dhyāne prasiddhatvāt dhyānaṃ vidheyamityuktam,
GSP33brsgor3u:3283: yathopapādaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ mūtrādi yasya tadbhāvastattvaṃ bālyavidhibalātpātityaśāstramanyaviṣayamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3285: na sa tatpadamāpnoti saṃsāraṃ cādhigacchati'ityādi śaucabhikṣādiniyamavidhiśāstrāviruddhasya bhāvaśuddhākhyabālyasya vidhisaṃbhavānna yatheṣṭaceṣṭāvidhiriti siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3291: aihikamapi saṃnyāsādibālyāntaṃ sādhanajātamuktvā tatsādhyavidyājanma vicāryata iti saṃgatiṃ vadan sādhanasya dvidhā phalasaṃbhavātsaṃśayamāha-sarvetyādinā
GSP33brsgor3u:3294: śuddhidvārā yajñādibhiḥ śravaṇādiṣu sākṣādvidyāhetuṣu ghaṭiteṣu vidyāvilambo na yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3295: dṛśyate ca vilambaḥ ataḥ śravaṇādervidyāhetutvamasiddhamiti pūrvapakṣe phalam /
GSP33brsgor3u:3296: pratibandhakavaśādvilambe 'pi hetutvasiddhiriti siddhānte phalaṃ matvā citrādivadaniyataphalaṃ śravaṇādikamiti siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3297: nanu prārabdhakarmaviśeṣeṇa śravaṇādiphalapratibandhaḥ kimiti kriyate śravaṇādinaiva karmavipākapratibandhaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-upasthitavipākatvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3304: tathāpi karmaṇaiva śravaṇādipratibandho na vaiparītyamityatra ko hetustamāha-sādhaneti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3315: asati prārabdhakarmapratibandhe śravaṇādinehaiva vidyodayaḥ yajñādibhiḥ saṃcitapāpapratibandhasya nirastatvāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:3316: sati tu bhogena tannirāsādamutreti vidyāyā aihikāmuṣmikatvaviśeṣaniyama uktastadvatphale
GSP33brsgor3u:3319: tasyāṃ vidyāvadviśeṣaniyamo 'sti na veti phalasyobhayathāsaṃbhavātsaṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha-yatheti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3323: kiñca śravaṇāditāratamyādvidyāyāṃ kañcidatiśayamaṅgīkṛtya vidyālabhyamuktau nātiśaya ityāha-apica vidyāsādhanamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3326: vidyayābhivyaktatvena brahmānanda eva mukhyaphalamabhivyaktiravidyānivṛttirānandasvarūpasphūrtipratibandhakābhāvatayā vidyayā sādhyate sā cānirvācyeti na dvaitāpattiḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3336: kathaṃ tarhi pūrvādhikaraṇe vidyāyā viśeṣa uktaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:3338: satyāmapi sāmagryāṃ jñāne vilamba ukto na tāratamyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3339: tarhi satyapi jñāne muktau vilambaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-natviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3340: vāyvādipratibandhāddipotpattivilambe 'pyutpanne tamonivṛttivilambādarśanātsati jñāne nājñānanivṛttau vilamba iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3341: kiñca karmaṇāmupāsanānāṃ ca guṇabhedena tāratamyātphalatāratamyaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsgor3u:3346: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatkṛtau śārīrakavyākhyāyā bhāṣyaratnaprabhāṭīkāyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ
